subject: Baseball
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
Auctions
lead_paragraph: The Texas Rangers were sold early Thursday morning to a group led by Nolan Ryan, the team’s president, and Chuck Greenberg, a lawyer who owns two minor-league teams.
snippet: The Texas Rangers were sold early Thursday morning to a group led by Nolan Ryan, the team’s president, and Chuck Greenberg, a lawyer who owns two minor-league teams.
